meanings.definition: To interrupt the normal functions or actions of
meanings.sent1: The loud noise disturbed my concentration while studying.
meanings.sent2: The barking dog disturbed the peace of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected phone call disturbed his evening plans.
meanings.sent4: The sudden rain disturbed the calm of the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake disturbed the tranquility of the town.

meanings.sent1: The sad movie disturbed her, making her cry.
meanings.sent2: The news of the accident disturbed him deeply.
meanings.sent3: The missing pet poster disturbed her, reminding her of her lost cat.
meanings.sent4: The argument disturbed the harmony of the family dinner.
meanings.sent5: The breakup disturbed his emotional balance for weeks.

meanings.sent1: The disturbed man talked to himself on the street.
meanings.sent2: The disturbed patient required specialized care.
meanings.sent3: The disturbed artist created unique and unconventional pieces.
meanings.sent4: The disturbed individual struggled with daily tasks.
meanings.sent5: The disturbed behavior raised concerns among the neighbors.
